text: int max ( int a , int b ) { if ( a > b ) return a ; return b ; } int calcsum ( int arr [ ] , int noel , int n , int presentelem , int currentrow , int sum ) { if ( currentrow == n ) { sum = sum + presentelem ; return sum ; } sum = sum + arr [ presentelem - 1 ] + max ( calcsum ( arr , noel , n , presentelem + currentrow , currentrow + 1 , sum ) , calcsum ( arr , noel , n , presentelem + currentrow + 1 , currentrow + 1 , sum ) ) ; } int main ( ) { int t ; while ( t -- ) { int n ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int noel = ( n * ( n + 1 ) ) / 2 ; int i , arr [ noel ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < noel ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i ] ) ; } int maxsum = 0 ; maxsum = calcsum ( arr , noel , n , 1 , 1 , 0 ) ; printf ( "%d\n" , maxsum ) ; } return 0 ; }
